ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoFillInAllValues
ValidationMessage.comment: All fields need to be filled with values.

ValidationMessage.name: CasBoIssueInitiationDateGTDueDate
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The Due Date must be greater than or equal to Initiation Date.

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbCannotCreateIssueWhileSubstituted
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: You are not allowed to create customer tasks during the substitution time frame, if you are the substituted user.
ValidationMessage.comment: validates if the current user is substituted and a substitution is running
